com.navis.framework.presentation.charting

Interface EChart

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IChart
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChart, BarChart, BulletChart, GaugeChart, LineChart, PieChart, ScatterPlotChart, StackedBarChart, TableViewChart

    public interface EChart
    This interface represents a Chart POJO. A gadget contains a Chart.
    Author:
    Gisella Saavedra, Oct 15, 2010

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChartAttribute(java.lang.String inAttribName, java.lang.Object inValue)
      Will only add an attribute if it does NOT exist.
      java.lang.Object getChartAttribute(java.lang.String inAttribName)
      Returns the value associated with a chart attribute.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getChartAttributes()
      Returns a map of the chart attributes and their values.
      EChartDataManager getChartDataManager()
      Returns the custom chart data manager associated with the chart.
      java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.String inTarget)
      Returns the color associated with a chart property.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.awt.Color> getColors()
      Returns the colors associated with chart properties.
      java.util.Map<MetafieldId,FilterProperty> getDatasetFilterProperties()
      Returns the database filter properties associated with the chart.
      java.awt.Font getFont(java.lang.String inTarget)
      Returns the font associated with a chart property.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.awt.Font> getFonts()
      Returns the fonts associated with chart properties.
      PlotPanel getPlotPanel()
      Returns the chart's plot panel.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Returns the chart's title.
      boolean hasGraphVisualAidElement(GraphVisualAidElementEnum inVisualAidElement)
      Returns whether a graph visual aid is present in the chart.
